jsoul.midi

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsoul.midi.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which provides static methods to play Notes, Chords, Tracks, Sequences, and MIDI files. Not advised for dynamic sound in a program, as there will be a bit of latency between calling a "play" method and hearing the sound. Additionally, if a play method is called in a program, the program will pause until the playing has ceased.
    Author:
    Andrew Goldin
